title: 求一个32位电脑能打开的1.7.10forge纯净包
author: 柠檬不卖萌w
txt_content:
求助 服务器客户端32位电脑玩家打不开hmcl
有没有32位电脑能打开的1.7.10纯净forge端
最好是旋律启动器

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-3-19 11:33 编辑 

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469

启动器的话 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-642599-1-1.html

replies.author: Jltxzzz
replies.txt_content:
你需要java7https://download.oracle.com/otn/ ... 80-windows-i586.exe
然后再换一个启动器

replies.author: 柠檬不卖萌w
replies.txt_content:

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469

启动器的话 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6 ...

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
星皇丶柠檬 发表于 2020-3-19 11:58
为什么我做到包同样是hmcljava7就用不了？
不要用 java 7 ，去用 java 8

replies.txt_content:
